summary: The World Health Organization has discovered a possible way of curing the Ebola patients in Guinea, Sierra Leone, Nigeria, and Liberia. This treatment is just by using the blood of survivors from the 1995 outbreak and to do a blood transfusion to see if it will help create antibodies and help cure them. The only problem is that it has not been tested yet, so my question is why? If they start then may be just may be it will help cure the patients being affected by Ebola. The most important question is that if we use it on the patients after testing the transfusion, will it be able to neutralize it or just stall it for awhile. I do believe though that this may be able to help the world in discovering what will neutralize Ebola.
title: Ebola Treatment
